main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Bataan, Philippines, including observations of various unidentified flying objects by military personnel and local citizens.
interesting points: Three spherical, transparent objects were observed moving at high speed and irregular courses., Five bright objects were spotted making rapid maneuvers and were described as transparent with internal light., Up to nine hours of intermittent observation of objects were recorded over several years., A small light seen off Bataan Cove was observed by multiple Air Force officers and civilian personnel, moving rapidly and hovering., The sightings included reports from credible witnesses such as military officers and radar stations.
sighted object: spherical and disc-like shapes, bright objects, and a small white light
witness description: Military personnel, a Filipino fisherman, and local citizens
